div.div: Breakfast & lunch for students during closure

CUSD schedule for students needing meals 4.3.2020
Student meals during our spring break Dear Parents, Students, and Families of the Cabrillo Unified School District:
This upcoming Monday April 6th and Wednesday April 8th, we will be distributing meals for our students from 11:30 to 12:30 at Hatch, Moonridge, and El Granada. These meals will cover the five days of service.
Additionally, please note that starting Thursday April 9th, there will be weekly grocery supplements provided by Second Harvest at the Ted Adcock Center from 3:00 to 5:00 PM.
Estimados padres, estudiantes, y familias del Distrito Unificado de Cabrillo:
Queremos informarles que la semana de vacaciones (del 6 al 10 de abril), distribuiremos alimentos a nuestros estudiantes en Hatch, Moonridge, y El Granada, en los siguientes horarios:
Lunes 6 y miércoles 8, de las 11:30 to 12:30.Se distribuirán alimentos para los cinco días de la semana.
Así mismo, les informamos que El Banco de Alimentos Second Harvest distribuirá alimentos y comidas adicionales de 3:00 a 5:00 de la tarde cada jueves en el Centro Ted Adcock.
Schedule starting April 13th Please choose the site closest to you to pick up your students meals.
Breakfast & Lunch Meals
Mondays: 2 days breakfast and lunch meals
Wednesdays: 3 days breakfast and lunch meals
Location: Hatch & El Granada
Time: 11:00am to 12:30pm
Location: Moonridge
Time: 11:30 to 12:30
Second Harvest Groceries
Thursdays
Location: Ted Adcock Center
Time: 3pm to 5pm
First come first serve basis until Further notice.
Es
Es
498 Kelly Avenue, Half Moon Bay, CA 94019 | Phone 650 712-7100 | Fax 650 726-0279
